reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have now purchased six, yes 6 of these denim dresses. They are comfortable, roomy, durable & entirely practical. The big pockets are great, and the skirt/bottom has worked well to carry pretty rocks out of the wilderness, grapefruits to my neighbors, and miscellaneous treasures as needed. It is pretty much my uniform these days, my go-to & signature style! Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and comfy
reviews.reviewText: I love this dress! I'm 5'8 and 180ish lbs, I sized down based on the other reviews so I ordered a medium instead of my regular large. It was still very roomy so I gave those to my sister and ordered a small. The small is a better fit (still roomy) but tighter in the chest and arms. It's not so tight that it's uncomfortable but just be mindful if you don't like anything snug up top because there's no stretch. I love the natural cotton/linen blend. I washed both dresses before wearing in cold/cold on delicate cycle and dried on low/ delicate with no shrinkage. They don't really need to be ironed because they look better in their natural state (if you wear linen you know what I mean). I bought the natural/tan and black. They aren't see through at all. They hit just slightly below my knees in front, slightly longer in back. This dress is not for everyone. It's only for truly confident women who know how to wear unique styles. The pockets are fabulous!! Not your run of the mill on seam pockets, these pockets are super convenient for keys, readers, cell phone.. anything in your hand you don't want to lay down (and forget where you put it 😂) I have gotten many compliments on this dress and it's easy to wear. It can be thrown on for running errands or an appointment. It's super versatile and easily transforms from casual to dressy (with great jewelry and shoes). Get this dress!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seams are not all finished, but it looks SO good
reviews.reviewText: This dress is perfect for my apple body: perfect disguise! and the dress isn't too long for me even though I'm only five feet even! The seams aren't all finished but for the price the dress still rates high. I got the orange dress with an obvious hold in the front but I returned it. Minibee's quality control and the finish isn't perfect, and I haven't washed it yet (fingers crossed) so I can't comment on the shrinkage. I plan to wash it in a delicates bag on gentle cycle and air dry it, but the material may not be able to withstand it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I think this dress will be really easy to wear this summer. Lightweight but quality fabric. The drape is really nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4 stars, odd fit
reviews.reviewText: Minibee Women's Ruffle Oversize Casual Midi Dresses with Pockets Style 2 Black Stripe M ($39.99)I’m 5’4 190lbs and ordered M. I like the length (below the knee) and the fabric which was lightweight. I like that this dress has pockets. My issue was the fit/cut of the dress. The fit was not flattering so I took one star off. Aside from that I really did like everything about the dress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Potato Sack Perfection
reviews.reviewText: Ok, so it does look like a potato sack, but I think that was relatively obvious from the pictures. I even like it more than expected. I'm tall and fat and was worried it would be awkward with my proportions but it looks great and is super comfortable. Perfect lounge dress with leggings.Some reviews noted poor construction and itchy fabric but I didnt find that the case. I sew and found the construction perfectly fine. And the fabric feels like a cotton/linen blend would. It actually feels a bit more like pure linen. But all natural fibers makes it a win for me.For size reference: I'm 5'10" and measurements are 52/45/60. I bought a 3x and it's still roomy and loose and has space for my shoulders, which are often too tight. Length hits me at the bottom of the knee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Deep pockets, flowy comfortable fit, lightweightCons: pretty itchy texture, protruding folds at the hips are very pronounced, lightweight but EVERY so slightly see through, the cut of the pattern is very strange.Conclusion: will use as a painting smock for my hippie/cottage core art days

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wash it many times before using.
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute denim dress and seems well-made. However it had a super weird smell when it arrived. I washed it in the sink a few times and then machine dried it. Some of the smell was still there so I washed it again in a bucket. I think I ended up washing it 5 times. But now it is soft and more comfortable. A lot of the dye washed out but it didn't seem to affect the color. So - don't wash it in your washing machine with clothes that you don't want to be blue. The cut is very "apple" shaped. It looks cute with leggings.

This dress is awesome. I wore it alone with shorts in summer and now fall is here, it is being worn with tights or leggings. I want more. Fit is perfect! I bought XL and it looks great. I could wear this XS too. It just works!

reviews.reviewTitle: La taille que j’ai choisi est parfaite.
reviews.reviewText: J’aime l’effet de cette robe, confortable.
Tout d’abord la couleur grise commandée est plutôt beige. Le tissu est un coton mince . Belle coupe. Confortable.
Me gusto, viene mucho muy grande, lo pedí en mi talla habitual y me quedo enorme, no lo regrese prefiero hacer unos cuantos arreglos.
